comment: I wish we met earlier and had more time together✨.I can never thank you enough for the emotional strength❤️ that you give me and for always handling my overthinking with such patience🫂. From late night talks to all the crazy stuff(iykyk)😉, we made some wonderful memories. Let's keep making more!🥰
name: Hritika

comment:
Humare group ka tren twin.
Gym ki bkc humesha yaad rahegi 😂
Stay in touch bro.
Next time jab milenge tab height badhake ana 2 inch mast💪.
name: Arjun Singh

comment: Aur bhai Gym kab chalna hai bata💪. You were official alarm clock of 308😂…har bar tune hi utaya hai subhe ke lectures mein🙃. Will definitely miss those gym days, raat ko chai time, and reels sessions😂. All thr best bhai🤝
name: Shubham Pednekar

comment: The most sincere and cool guy . The one who really does not get into controversies and is liked by everyone. A great partner in crime and blr laggi toh milte rahenge.
name: Ayush Sinha

comment: Mera smart, charming aur ripped dost. Gym me kya hi pace pakdi isne😂. Wo ground pe raat me stargazing, saare college ke events, itne saare trips, and in general meri college life was better because of you. Also, DLF chlate kisi din. Milte rahiyo bhai, abhi aur bkc bhi karni hai.
name: Aditya Handa

comment: Had so much fun on all our impromptu trips, whether it was Simcha or Ujjain and also the random campus walks. Thank you for being a true friend even in the tough times. Aur haan vivid pe actual mai acchi aati hai photos😂😂
name: Neyasha Sinha

comment: Bhai dusre ko bhi strike de diya kar. Steal a man's crush but don't get him run out. Out of nowhere one liners ache maarta h bhai. Blr me gym and parties soon. Lil gym bro
name: Nikhil Raizada

comment: Hamare grp ka parthiv patel. Strike rotate kar lia kar bhai thoda samne koi bhi ho iykyk. Juss bicos tu dost hain mera milte rahio bhai.
name: Aman Mandawat

comment: You are an extremely kind person and really personable. The amount of gratitude you have is worth appreciating. I wish you excel in life always and may your talents get the right direction. Wishing you all the gains , health and happiness. ❤️🤝
name: Prasad Chaudhari

comment: Hey Prashant! From Going home via train to trips like Shimcha and Ujjain had a nyc tym with uh.....the most silent unknown guy who became a part of the grp in no tym.....nd remember 'gujjar' tag mne diya tha tujhe😂😂Wish uh all the very best for your future🙌🙌
name: Nikita Singh

comment: Amazing guy with a great sense of humour. All the best for future and stay in touch!
name: Harsh Verma
